title: Double Monte Grappa Ascent, Stelvio, Gravel, Two Time Trials Mark 2024 Giro D’Italia Route
content:
The 21 stages of the 2024 Giro d'Italia were unveiled in a presentation in Trento on Friday, with gravel, time trials, and the Monte Grappa defining the route.
